DOC.brief_summary: Study objective : To assess nocturnal change mechanosensitivity chemosensitivity hypertensive sleep apnea-hypopnea syndrome ( SAHS ) patient SAHS patient isolate nocturnal hypertension . To value continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) effect parameter . Design : Controlled cross-over longitudinal study . Settings : Madrid metropolitan area . Patients : Day-night sustained hypertensive isolate nocturnal hypertensive patient SAHS without previous treatment . At least 30 patient need . Interventions : Patients allocate treatment arm ( CPAP vs. sham CPAP ) three month . Explorations perform immediately sleep 0- , 3- , 6-months trial . Measurements : 24-h urinary catecholamine , local vascular factor , angiotensin aldosterone level . Diaphragmatic tension-time index , metabolic rate , hypoxic withdrawal test , ventilatory inspiratory neural drive response progressive isocapnic hypoxia .
